name: SNAPPII
tag_list: web-service, iphone-app, make-iphone-apps, wysiwyg-editor, iphone, apps-for-businesses, smart-phone, itunes
overview:
Snappii is a do-it-yourself platform for creating mobile apps. We offer free assistance to help you build apps. Create your own mobile app in a matter of minutes with no programming at all!

Why every business needs a mobile app? The most basic answer is because smart phone has become the #1 screen that people pay attention to. When a business has a custom branded iPhone app, it can

  • Reach customers 8+ hours
  • achieve higher conversion on special offers and discounts sent to customers and prospects
  • drive customers to nearest locations
  • offer customers better support
  • leverage the community to grow the brand though social networks
  • increase build customer database

Why Snappii? Unlike competitors which generate nearly identical apps, Snappii offers the ability to create 100% individualized apps while achieving remarkable ease of use

Snappii offers:

  • WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) editor for creating custom user interface (UI) and making each app unique
  • Web2iPhone testing. Test your app on your iPhone in minutes
  • No apps to download from AppStore, No iTunes, No cables
  • Outstanding real human assistance and support

How it works Go to Snappii.com and register

  1. Choose how you want to make your app.
  2. Using the editor, simply drag and drop buttons and screen elements on the iPhone and see exactly how your iPhone app will look like.
  3. Test the app on your iPhone using Web2iPhone copy.
  4. Submit the App to Apple/Google play.

Convenient app creating system Until now Snappii was a DIY platform (do-it-yourself) for non programmers who wanted to create mobile apps. Based on customer demand Snappii has expanded its service to include full service app development. Clients fill out an App Request Form and Snappii builds the app. Customers can also choose to have Snappii maintain the app for them.

All app requests are reviewed in 24 hours. Clients will get a reply with an estimate time frame needed for their app development. App development starts at only from $500 depending on the app complexity. In addition to full app development Snappii now offers 3 app maintenance plans which enable customers to enjoy ongoing app development and improvement. The app maintenance plans cover ANY app changes that customers desire and enable customers’ apps to continue to evolve based on new requirements and new features in mobile technology:

The 3 app maintenance and ongoing development plans are:

A - Monthly Unlimited Changes - Changes can be submitted to Snappii once a month for the next 12 months. Customers can submit unlimited number of changes!

B - Quarterly Unlimited Changes - Changes can be submitted to Snappii once a quarter for 12 months. Customers can submit unlimited number of changes.

C – Anytime Unlimited Changes – Customers can submit unlimited number of changes any time.

Each plan includes:

• App content and feature changes,

• Release on all mobile platforms supported by Snappii,

• Use of analytics dashboard and push notifications,

• Hosting,

• Rapid Change distribution

Snappii customers can also benefit from the “You-Start-We-Finish” Special offer for only $30 per hour.

Snappii offers FREE apps for Associations.

Anyone can request a free prototype from Snappii. Free prototypes are delivered to a customer within 48 hours.

DIY customers are welcome to submit their apps to Apple for $39 per app per month. If customers want to make sure their app looks good enough for Apple, they can ask the Snappii team to review the app first for only $150. Snappii team will make all the necessary changes.
